General.Name: Taichung Commercial Bank Co Ltd
General.Description: Taichung Commercial Bank Co., Ltd. provides various banking products and services in Taiwan. The company offers various deposit products, such as savings account and time deposit accounts, foreign currency demand deposits, cash, and travel checks and remittance; corporate finance services, which include corporate loans, letter of credit, collections, and factoring and forfaiting, as well as account information, deposits, payments, accounts receivable financing, hedging strategies, financial instruments, and consultation services; and personal mortgage loans comprising house mortgage, house renovations, children's education funds, business start-up capital, investments, and financial management services. It also provides financial advice, asset allocation, consultation service, and trust planning, as well as family and retirement services; credit cards; and online and mobile banking, and mobile payment services. The company was formerly known as Taichung Small and Medium Business Bank Company Limited and changed its name to Taichung Commercial Bank Co., Ltd. in December 1998. Taichung Commercial Bank Co., Ltd. was founded in 1952 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 87, Min Chuan Road, Taichung, Taiwan, 40341
